response.original_title: Just the Facts: Historical Icons: Coretta Scott King
response.overview: Coretta Scott King was the wife of the slain civil rights activist Martin Luther King Jr. and a noted community leader in her own right. Coretta Scott King has made huge accomplishments throughout her life, including carrying on the legacy of her husband for over three decades. This informative program will take you through her life story.
response.title: Just the Facts: Historical Icons: Coretta Scott King
